description: Actinia importer module supporting raster and vector data.

import_descr.description: The type of the input that should be downloaded and imported.
import_descr.name: type

import_descr.description: The band of the sentinel2 scene that should be imported
import_descr.name: sentinel_band

import_descr.description: The atmospheric correction that should be applied to the landsat scene
import_descr.name: landsat_atcor

import_descr.description: The name of the layer that should be imported form the vector file or postGIS database
import_descr.name: vector_layer

import_descr.description: The input source that may be a landsat scene name, a sentinel2 scene name, a postGIS database string, or an URL that points to an accessible raster or vector file
import_descr.name: source

import_descr.description: User name and password for basic HTTP, HTTPS and FTP authentication of the source connection.
import_descr.name: basic_auth

parameters.description: Name of raster map to be imported by actinia.
parameters.name: raster

parameters.description: Name of vector map to be imported by actinia. Or data source for direct OGR access.
parameters.name: vector
